rows.label: qev010301_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hey there, [ST:playername ]! I managed to
get in touch with my team, thanks to you.
They're on their way here now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010301_MSG0002
rows.name:
So what are you doing back out here, anyway?
You bored or something? If so, I suppose I can
give you that bounty assignment I flubbed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010301_MSG0003
rows.name:
The mark's a bold cinicula that has been
running around making life hell for everyone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010301_MSG0004
rows.name:
Ha! Somebody's chomping at the bit, huh? I bet you
take that bad boy down without breaking a sweat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010301_MSG0005
rows.name:
I'll forward the details to your comm device.
Have at it whenever you like.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010301_MSG0006
rows.name:
Hey, even the little missions like this help carve
out a future for humanity on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010301_MSG0007
rows.name:
You know what? I'm sending it to your comm device
anyway. Just in case you change your mind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010301_MSG0008
rows.name:
Good luck hunting that bold cinicula.
Just remember to stay calm, watch
for an opening, and then strike![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev010301_MSG0009
rows.name:
Not that I should be giving hunting advice, seeing as
how I ran screaming from it earlier... But whatever![ST:wait ]
